data.name: EXC_TMPL_CORRUPTED_OR_DAMAGED_FILE
data.value: Could not load file '{0}', file is corrupted or damaged.

data.value: Unable to decrypt file '{0}'. Password is invalid.

data.value: The storage path is not specified. Please provide storage path.

data.name: EXC_TMPL_TRANSFORMATION_FAILED_PAGE_NOT_EXIST
